verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: aim] [ARG2: at Russia 's government] [ARGM-LOC: in a rare rebuke] , [ARGM-ADV: criticizing President Vladimir Putin for Moscow 's support of Syrian president Bashar Assad] .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] took aim at Russia 's government in a rare rebuke , [V: criticizing] [ARG1: President Vladimir Putin] [ARG2: for Moscow 's support of Syrian president Bashar Assad] .
